author: Staff Reporter
text:
The city police arrested a 27-year-old labourer on charges of sexually assaulting a Standard 9 girl at Kondalampatti here.

The police said that when the girl was standing outside her home on March 26, Venaktesan took her to his house and assaulted her. The girl informed her parents who in turn lodged a complaint with the Town All Women Police Station.

The police registered a case under Section 7 and 8 of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act, 2012.

A medical examination was done on the girl at Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital on Monday.
title: TAMIL NADU
